properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Walipomuua Yesu
walidhani wameshinda,
kumbe badala yake
injili yaenda mbele.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Injili yaenda mbele,
injili yaenda mbele,
kumbe badala yake
injili yaenda mbele. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Walipomsulubisha
walidhani wameshinda,
kumbe badala yake
injili yaenda mbele.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Walipomtema mate
walidhani wameshinda,
kumbe badala yake
injili yaenda mbele.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Walipomnywesha siki
walidhani wameshinda,
kumbe badala yake
injili yaenda mbele.
